name: Roofing Claw Hammer
description: 16 oz straight-claw hammer suited for zinc work and nail removal.

name: 25 ft Measuring Tape
description: Steel tape for verifying spans and cut lengths during roof rebuilds.

name: Carbon Steel Machete
description: Heavy-duty machete for stripping vines, brush, and young saplings.

name: Fence Hammer & Sledge Set
description: Combination of straight-claw hammers and small sledge for tamping posts and driving staples.

name: Yard Rakes & Forks Set
description: Bundle of heavy-duty rakes and pitchforks for pulling biomass into piles.

name: Cutlass Sharpening File
description: Metal file used to sharpen machetes and cutlasses during extended clearing shifts.
